price: 50. Y tramaron su plan, mas hicimos que su plan se volviera en su contra sin darse cuenta.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
